entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:33 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: N 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
